title: Ranked 5v5s Bug
body:
Not sure if this has been reported but there have been some serious issues with ranked 5v5s lately on oce.

Sometimes the option to create a lobby for ranked 5s is not displayed.
Sometimes it will not let you invite team members to lobby, displaying error, "Summoner does not meet the requirements to join this queue" while they are already a member of the team.

These issues have all be observed while ranked queues are active and have been occuring for about a week or 2 now.
Just reporting it. It's getting pretty annoying to fluff around for 30 mins loggin in and out every time we wanna ranked 5s.

Anyone else experienced similar issues?

replies.body:
I don't play teams, like ever, so I can't really say.

Try posting this on the Misc. boards. A red might actually see it there.

Do you have any connection issues while playing League? Have you let someone else try hosting?
